channel.title: [tut] simple text effects
channel.description:
Solemage
Test effects
If you find I forgot something in any steps please pm me with the correction or part so I can fix Thanks :)
In this tutorial i will be showing you a few ways you can change your text without changing there font type.
Here are a few examples I will be teaching.
Examples: Here is a kinda sooming type wich is kinda fun looking at. [img]http://img368.imageshack.us/img368/9771/example1dl8.png[/img]
Here is a Ozzing looking one
[img]http://img450.imageshack.us/img450/9845/example2wb4.png[/img]
And here is a another wich is my favorit if you get the coloring right looks like a frosty text. [img]http://img82.imageshack.us/img82/4638/example3hb6.png[/img]
Now They arent realy that hard pretty basic I think..
for the kinda 3d one its this
1) Start out with a blank document if its black have white text if its white make black text, once you learn these you can use diffrent colors for your sigs or anything you chose..
2) NOw Write what ever you like and move it twards the center of the document. Now Duplicate the render 2 or 3 times, You can do this by pressing "Ctrl+j" 2 or 3 times. [img]http://img416.imageshack.us/img416/8427/inthemiddlegc8.png[/img]
3) Now click on the 2 new layers eyes so they are gone. Like this. [img]http://img416.imageshack.us/img416/2266/looklikethisqa8.png[/img]
4) now Go to Filter>blur>motion blur and use these settings [img]http://img352.imageshack.us/img352/5008/settingsrd7.png[/img]
5) once you do this go and click the the layer above it, so the eye appears, Look now it looks cool, You can add your custom colors aor anything you like.
The OOzy gunky one is More easy then the last one.
1)Start with a new document and move your text to the center and duplicate the text 2 or 3 times by pressing "Ctrl+j" 2 or 3 times. and do this [img]http://img416.imageshack.us/img416/2266/looklikethisqa8.png[/img]
2) now select the first text and go to edit>transform>90 degrees counter clock wise.
3) now go to filter>stylize>wind and click from left and ok. Now if you like you can hit "Ctrl+f" to keep doing the wind but 2 times should be good.
4) now go to edit>transform>90 degrees clock wise, Now it should b looking normal but the text should be dropping downward. If its going upward then you either forgot to click coming from left or turned the text the wrong direction.
5) now go here and play around with the brigtness contrast levels. once you found it you can change the color and there ya go... [img]http://img516.imageshack.us/img516/3771/playwithwv9.png[/img]
Now The frosty one.. My favorite
1) you know how to start out, new document and make the background black just for this learning part.
2) write anything you like and move the text to the center of the screen and press "Ctrl+j" 2 times. now do this
[img]http://img416.imageshack.us/img416/2266/looklikethisqa8.png[/img]
3) as in the ozzing like tut go to edit>transform>90 degrees counter clock wise.
4) Now go to filter>stylize>wind and make shure your click on left, and methon wind. click ok. Now hit "Ctrl+f" do repeat the wind 1 mroe time should be good.
5) now go to edit>transform and 90 degrees clock wise so its upright again.
6) click on the eye above the layer and Wow you see the the perfext text you wrote but also its like falling down. play around with the color and you got an icy looking text :)
Finish Enjoy

item.title: [tut] simple text effects
item.dc:creator: @solemage2 solemage2
item.description:
@solemage2 wrote:

                                      Solemage
                           
			          Test effects

If you find I forgot something in any steps please pm me with the correction or part so I can fix
Thanks

In this tutorial i will be showing you a few ways you can change your text without changing there font type.

Here are a few examples I will be teaching.

Examples:
Here is a kinda sooming type wich is kinda fun looking at.

Here is a Ozzing looking one

And here is a another wich is my favorit if you get the coloring right looks like a frosty text.

Now They arent realy that hard pretty basic I think…

for the kinda 3d one its this

  1. Start out with a blank document if its black have white text if its white make black text, once you learn these you can use diffrent colors for your sigs or anything you chose…

  2. NOw Write what ever you like and move it twards the center of the document. Now Duplicate the render 2 or 3 times, You can do this by pressing “Ctrl+j” 2 or 3 times.

  3. Now click on the 2 new layers eyes so they are gone. Like this.

  4. now Go to Filter>blur>motion blur and use these settings

  5. once you do this go and click the the layer above it, so the eye appears, Look now it looks cool, You can add your custom colors aor anything you like.

The OOzy gunky one is More easy then the last one.

1)Start with a new document and move your text to the center and duplicate the text 2 or 3 times by pressing “Ctrl+j” 2 or 3 times. and do this

  1. now select the first text and go to edit>transform>90 degrees counter clock wise.

  2. now go to filter>stylize>wind and click from left and ok. Now if you like you can hit “Ctrl+f” to keep doing the wind but 2 times should be good.

  3. now go to edit>transform>90 degrees clock wise, Now it should b looking normal but the text should be dropping downward. If its going upward then you either forgot to click coming from left or turned the text the wrong direction.

  4. now go here and play around with the brigtness contrast levels. once you found it you can change the color and there ya go…

Now The frosty one… My favorite

  1. you know how to start out, new document and make the background black just for this learning part.

  2. write anything you like and move the text to the center of the screen and press “Ctrl+j” 2 times. now do this

  1. as in the ozzing like tut go to edit>transform>90 degrees counter clock wise.

  2. Now go to filter>stylize>wind and make shure your click on left, and methon wind. click ok.
    Now hit “Ctrl+f” do repeat the wind 1 mroe time should be good.

  3. now go to edit>transform and 90 degrees clock wise so its upright again.

  4. click on the eye above the layer and Wow you see the the perfext text you wrote but also its like falling down. play around with the color and you got an icy looking text 

     		Finish Enjoy
